attributes.action: Prevent Mobile Phones on the London Underground
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's bad enough sitting on a train or a bus, indeed a cafe having to listen to someones private life. The underground has a certain character about it that I feel would be lost if every other person is talking on their mobile phones. I say no to allowing any mobile network access to what goes on under our feet.
